overview: It's August 18, 1936, Civil War has broken out in Spain. Federico Garcia Lorca, Spain's greatest poet and dramatist is hiding out in the Granada home of friend and Falange member, Luis Ortiz Rosales. Lorca wanted for his outspoken liberal views, homosexuality, and artistic convictions awaits the arrival of the Nationalist soldiers to arrest him. As the world falls apart, Lorca's final voice is heard through a letter.
title: Letter from Lorca
